page.title: 10PUB
page.content: The Reindeer Inn. The Reindeer Inn is the only public house in Sturton and it has been ownned by the same person for 21 years-Derek Ashton.His mother and father still live in the village at Low Holland.As there are no other shops in the village he sells sweets and soft drinks for the children to buy.He sells 20,800 small cola bottles per annum.WHEN ever there is afunction at the village hall then MR ASHTON takes all the drinks and beer up there in his trailer and sets up the bar which has been built into the new hall.MOST OF THE PEOPLE who go to the pub come from the village itself thogh some do travel from other places but the drink/drive laws do not encourage this. .
